text: aur jab maanav ko koee duhkh pahunchata hai, to hamen lete, baithe ya khade hokar pukaarata hai. phir jab ham usaka duhkh door kar dete hain, to aise chal deta hai, jaise kabhee hamen kisee duhkh ke samay pukaara hee na ho! isee prakaar, ullanghanakaariyon ke lie unake karatoot shobhit bana diye gaye hain
